message.content:
Here is a list of 50 "message of the day" quotes formatted as an array of JSON objects containing the fields "message" and "author":

```json
[
    {"message": "The only way to do great work is to love what you do.", "author": "Steve Jobs"},
    {"message": "The future depends on what you do today.", "author": "Mahatma Gandhi"},
    {"message": "In the middle of every difficulty lies opportunity.", "author": "Albert Einstein"},
    {"message": "Your limitation—it's only your imagination.", "author": "Unknown"},
    {"message": "Believe you can and you're halfway there.", "author": "Theodore Roosevelt"},
    {"message": "Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.", "author": "William James"},
    {"message": "Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.", "author": "Roy T. Bennett"},
    {"message": "Dream big and dare to fail.", "author": "Norman Vaughan"},
    {"message": "You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.", "author": "C.S. Lewis"},
    {"message": "The best time to plant a tree was twenty years ago. The second best time is now.", "author": "Chinese Proverb"},
    {"message": "What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.", "author": "Zig Ziglar"},
    {"message": "Challenges are what make life interesting and overcoming them is what makes life meaningful.", "author": "Joshua J. Marine"},
    {"message": "Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.", "author": "Henry David Thoreau"},
    {"message": "Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.", "author": "Sam Levenson"},
    {"message": "Hardships often prepare ordinary people for an extraordinary destiny.", "author": "C.S. Lewis"},
    {"message": "Keep your face always toward the sunshine—and shadows will fall behind you.", "author": "Walt Whitman"},
    {"message": "The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.", "author": "Walt Disney"},
    {"message": "Limit your 'always' and your 'nevers'.", "author": "Amy Poehler"},
    {"message": "You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.", "author": "Wayne Gretzky"},
    {"message": "It's not whether you get knocked down, it's whether you get up.", "author": "Vince Lombardi"},
    {"message": "The mind is everything. What you think you become.", "author": "Buddha"},
    {"message": "Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success.", "author": "Albert Schweitzer"},
    {"message": "Opportunities don't happen, you create them.", "author": "Chris Grosser"},
    {"message": "Everything you’ve ever wanted is on the other side of fear.", "author": "George Addair"},
    {"message": "What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.", "author": "Ralph Waldo Emerson"},
    {"message": "Life is 10% what happens to us and 90% how we react to it.", "author": "Charles R. Swindoll"},
    {"message": "Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.", "author": "Winston S. Churchill"},
    {"message": "The biggest adventure you can take is to live the life of your dreams.", "author": "Oprah Winfrey"},
    {"message": "You have within you right now, everything you need to deal with whatever the world can throw at you.", "author": "Brian Tracy"},
    {"message": "Hard work beats talent when talent doesn't work hard.", "author": "Tim Notke"},
    {"message": "Don't be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.", "author": "Roy T. Bennett"},
    {"message": "Success is not final; failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.", "author": "Winston Churchill"},
    {"message": "If you're going through hell, keep going.", "author": "Winston Churchill"},
    {"message": "Doubt kills more dreams than failure ever will.", "author": "Suzy Kassem"},
    {"message": "The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.", "author": "Franklin D. Roosevelt"},
    {"message": "Everything you need is already inside you.", "author": "Unknown"},
    {"message": "Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.", "author": "Arthur Ashe"},
    {"message": "The harder you work for something, the greater you’ll feel when you achieve it.", "author": "Unknown"},
    {"message": "Don’t limit your challenges. Challenge your limits.", "author": "Unknown"},
    {"message": "Believe in yourself and all that you are. Know that there is something inside you that is greater than any obstacle.", "author": "Christian D. Larson"},
    {"message": "What we fear doing most is usually what we most need to do.", "author": "Tim Ferriss"},
    {"message": "Success is how high you bounce when you hit bottom.", "author": "George S. Patton"},
    {"message": "The best revenge is massive success.", "author": "Frank Sinatra"},
    {"message": "Hang on to your dreams, for if dreams die, life is a broken-winged bird that cannot fly.", "author": "Langston Hughes"},
    {"message": "Success is not in what you have, but who you are.", "author": "Bo Bennett"},
    {"message": "You can't use up creativity. The more you use, the more you have.", "author": "Maya Angelou"},
    {"message": "Perseverance is not a long race; it is many short races one after the other.", "author": "Walter Elliot"},
    {"message": "Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life.", "author": "Steve Jobs"},
    {"message": "If you can dream it, you can achieve it.", "author": "Zig Ziglar"},
    {"message": "The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.", "author": "Ralph Waldo Emerson"}
]
```

You can copy and use this array as needed in your applications or projects!
